block.p: Karen Leslie Finneran, a daughter of Patricia and William B. Finneran of Larchmont, N.Y., was married there yesterday to Thomas Edward Hamilton, a son of Rosemary and Robert Hamilton of Elk Grove Village, Ill. The Rev. Edmund J. Dobbin, the president of Villanova University, performed the ceremony at St. Augustine's Roman Catholic Church.

Mrs. Hamilton, 34, is the finance director in New York for CID, a new product division of Prada, the Italian fashion company. She graduated from Boston College and received a master's degree in public and private management from Yale University. Her father is a managing director for a venture capital group at First Union Securities in New York. He is also a board member of Covenant House in New York and a trustee of Villanova. Her mother is a member of the board of the Westchester Medical Center in Valhalla, N.Y.

Karen Leslie Finneran, a daughter of Patricia and William B. Finneran of Larchmont, N.Y., was married there yesterday to Thomas Edward Hamilton, a son of Rosemary and Robert Hamilton of Elk Grove Village, Ill. The Rev. Edmund J. Dobbin, the president of Villanova University, performed the ceremony at St. Augustine's Roman Catholic Church.

Mrs. Hamilton, 34, is the finance director in New York for CID, a new product division of Prada, the Italian fashion company. She graduated from Boston College and received a master's degree in public and private management from Yale University. Her father is a managing director for a venture capital group at First Union Securities in New York. He is also a board member of Covenant House in New York and a trustee of Villanova. Her mother is a member of the board of the Westchester Medical Center in Valhalla, N.Y.

Mr. Hamilton, 33, is a managing director in the bond trading division at Salomon Smith Barney in New York. He graduated from the University of Dayton. His mother is the business manager in Elk Grove Village for Miller/Ace Hardware. His father retired as a sales manager for Sears, Roebuck & Company in Chicago.
